function.description: This construct provides a convenient way to convert a date made by the Date plugin to the specific TIMESTAMP ANSI SQL datatype.
function.longDescription:
To insert a date-time value into an RDBMS column of a TIMESTAMP datatype, it is sometimes necessary to explicitly cast that value to TIMESTAMP in order for the DB to correctly process the data.
This construct helps with that but it can only use date-times made by the Date plugin.
